feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy except freezing rain over southern sections this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
